::Symphony/Surgital/Quatro::

Symphony was taken down by Wildrider, and a s=
hot from somewhere barely missed him.  He landed and let out an "oof!"
~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Surgital looked at his target=
, Lavatron, and fired two eye lazers from each eye.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Quatro, currently in hoverbike mode, arrived at=
 the Decepticon base.  He had come to find Megatron.  Quatro was on the opp=
osite end of Slaughter, so he wasn't in much danger of that.  But Quatro ne=
eded to get in.  His chest opened up to reveal two huge plasma cannons, and=
 his shoulders opened up and revealed two huge missile launchers.  Then, he=
 fired 2 missiles at the Avian, and 4 plasma blasts in total at it.
OOC: So=
rry if this was moding, using two different weapons, missile launchers and =
plasma cannons, at once.
